name: E.A. Johnston
description:
E.A. Johnston ( - )
Listen to freely downloadable audio sermons by the speaker E.A. Johnston in mp3 format. E. A. Johnston lives in Memphis, Tennessee and is a fellow of the Stephen Olford Institute for Biblical Preaching. He is currently involved in Bible teaching and disciple making, as well as authoring books. Some of his titles include: Realities of Revival (series), Church in Revival (series), Call to Revival (series), Return to Me, No Turning Back, The Master’s Plan, Walking with God, etc.
"If the Church will not defend His holy Name then the Almighty must. God will either pour out His blessings in revival to defend His holy Name, or He will pour out His wrath upon mankind to avenge His holy Name. It will either be a defending or avenging to show forth His glory and remind mankind He alone is the Sovereign ruler of all."

audio_sermons.title: A Silent Church Amidst A Sinful Nation
audio_sermons.description: Brother E.A. Johnston speaks on the silence of the Church in the midst of a sin depraved society. He speaks of a time of persecution coming in North America to the Church. Worldliness has prevailed in the Church and no power of the Spirit present. There is a time needed of great repentance for the Church of God.

audio_sermons.title: America Revival Or Ruin
audio_sermons.description: Ernest Johnston gives a powerful plea for true revival in America. He clearly defines the moral decay of the society of America in morals and spirituality. He shows that fallen state of the Church and its lost of power. We need a revival back to the church that has power with God, preaching truth without compromise. He declares that God is sending remedial judgments to America to get the attention of the Church.

audio_sermons.title: America The Desolate!
audio_sermons.description: Brother E.A. Johnston shares there is a Departing of God from a nation, the withdrawn presence of God, and the judgment from God. God will shake a nation to rouse a sleeping church. What matters in the end is the souls of men.

audio_sermons.title: American Church Buffet
audio_sermons.description: When somebody is searching for a church today, they usually ask the following questions to the church secretary or Pastor: Do you have a youth program? How many ball fields do you have? Do you have a fitness center and does it have basketball courts? Do you have a contemporary music program at your church and a good worship band? Do you have recovery groups for the divorced and drug-dependent? Do you have yoga classes? Do you have Zumba dance classes? In other words, a typical American family looking for a typical American church today approaches it like they do a buffet line in a restaurant with a smorgasbord of choices. In essence, they are saying, “Before I join your church let me see a menu and look over it to see if you can service my family the way I want you to.”

audio_sermons.title: An Awakening Sermon
audio_sermons.description: We live in a day of a compromised gospel, a powerless pulpit and a worldly church. I can sum up the American church today as described by a recent visit of an Oriental pastor who came to America to see for himself what the churches were like. He said, “First, karaoke, then a lecture.” That sums it up friends. We have very little preaching in our pulpits today. It is mainly teaching, teaching informs, teaching transforms. The message you’re about to hear is not a politically correct gospel, rather it is a full presentation of the gospel of the Son of God preached in the full counsel of God.

Listen to freely downloadable audio sermons by the speaker E.A. Johnston in mp3 format. E. A. Johnston lives in Memphis, Tennessee and is a fellow of the Stephen Olford Institute for Biblical Preaching. He is currently involved in Bible teaching and disciple making, as well as authoring books. Some of his titles include: Realities of Revival (series), Church in Revival (series), Call to Revival (series), Return to Me, No Turning Back, The Master’s Plan, Walking with God, etc.
"If the Church will not defend His holy Name then the Almighty must. God will either pour out His blessings in revival to defend His holy Name, or He will pour out His wrath upon mankind to avenge His holy Name. It will either be a defending or avenging to show forth His glory and remind mankind He alone is the Sovereign ruler of all."

audio_sermons.title: The Apostate Church In America: The Cappuccino Church
audio_sermons.description: E.A. Johnston shares a powerful prophetic message on the state of the American Church and the current apostasy. He shares on how churches have been influenced by the world and the pulpits have lost the seriousness of the fear of the Lord. He states that churches can now damn people and not save them when they do not preach an pure gospel of Jesus Christ. The Gospel of the apostate church speaks of the gospel of comfortable christianity.

audio_sermons.title: The Implosion of America
audio_sermons.description: Brother E.A. Johnston speaks of the sad and tragic reality of the people of God in America that have departed from God. He shows 3 principles according to the Word of God that when a nation departs from God. This is a call to the people of God in America to repent and seek the Lord in repentance and mercy.

audio_sermons.title: The Solemn Assembly
audio_sermons.description: Brother EA gives a powerful urgent plea for repentance in the Church in America. The manifest presence has left the corporate Church gatherings, we need to turn back to the Lord in fasting, praying and weeping. Like in the days of Ezekiel there are so many hidden sins yet they have a sense of worship in that day. This hypocrisy needs to be stopped and for us to pray for revival confessing our need. We need such a solemn assembly in our day.

He is currently involved in Bible teaching and disciple making, as well as authoring books. Some of his titles include: Realities of Revival (series), Church in Revival (series), Call to Revival (series), Return to Me, No Turning Back, The Master’s Plan, Walking with God, etc.
"If the Church will not defend His holy Name then the Almighty must. God will either pour out His blessings in revival to defend His holy Name, or He will pour out His wrath upon mankind to avenge His holy Name. It will either be a defending or avenging to show forth His glory and remind mankind He alone is the Sovereign ruler of all."

audio_sermons.title: When Revival Bypasses The Established Church
audio_sermons.description: Brother EA shares his heart towards revival in the nation of America and the sad state of the formal established denominational churches. He shows how God works outside the box in a New Thing and that God always raises up preachers to minister His truth whether or not they are accepted by the masses. This is an important message to bring many to repentance and to support and proclaim the gospel in its purity and power in our day.
